dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.product.offer.rule.ProdOfferPriceAction
dataStructure.description:
The outcome of the successful evaluation of a PolicyStatement (that is, one that has met its condition(s)). The outcome is expressed in terms of the price of a ProductOffering. A ProdOfferPriceAction is a type of PolicyAction.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: ProdOfferPriceAction

child.name: productOfferingPrice
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association ProdOfferPriceActionResultsInProdOfferPrice

This association end is optional
child.label: productOfferingPrice
